These Bylaws constitute a binding legal agreement. The provisions of these Terms and Conditions shall apply to any use made by you (hereinafter: the "User"). This is an agreement between Tismo Ltd. (TISMO LTD) hereinafter referred to as "the Company", the owner and operators of www.TISMOAPP.com ("TISMO Website"), and / or the TISMO System "TISMO Service", and / or the management interface, and / Or the "Service", and / or the Tismo "App" (hereinafter the "App") and you are the user of the Service. Separate from the policy and vice versa, if you do not agree to all these terms, you cannot use the Service. TISMO is a technological system that includes an Internet management interface and / or application and / or website on the Internet, which serves as the official website for club memberships of brands and retail companies and allows the public users and Internet surfers to view the company's brands, purchase products and services offered for sale, promotions, benefits and more. The app and / or website. The user declares and warrants that he / she is aware of this site's policies and agrees to his instructions and that he and / or his or her claim will not be directly and / or indirectly against the application and the website and / or any of its operators and / or any of its owners and / or Which of its managers and / or who on their behalf. The provisions of these Terms and Conditions shall apply to any use and purchase made by the user of the application and site, and will form the legal basis for any discussion between the user and the company, it is clarified that using the application and browsing the site and / or performing actions on the application and site. The user must be qualified to perform binding legal actions; If the user is a minor (under the age of 18) or is not entitled to take legal action without the consent of a guardian, he / she must inform his / her parents and / or their legal guardians (hereinafter: "the parents") regarding the provisions of these articles of association and obtain their approval to carry out any activity of any kind. Which is, as part of the app and the site. The parents have a responsibility to inform the minors who wish to use the application and browse the site regarding the regulations, as well as to monitor the activities of the minors so that the minors will act in accordance with the terms of these regulations. Any activity that will be performed by the minors in the application and website constitutes the consent of the minors and / or the parents to what is stated in the terms of the regulations. What is stated in these regulations applies equally to both sexes, and the use of the masculine pronoun is for convenience only. The company may, at its sole discretion, terminate the activity of the application and the site at any time and without prior notice. The company reserves the right to prevent access to the application and the site and / or the possibility to use the application and purchases on the site and / or to cancel the participation of a user whose behavior is inappropriate or not in accordance with the terms of use, or trying to impair the proper management of the application and site. The headings of the regulations and sections are for convenience only. For the avoidance of doubt, these Terms and Conditions will also bind any provider towards the operator of the site and the app, and in any case, will not be considered an agreement in favor of any third party. Using the app, browsing the website and / or purchasing products or services offered for use and selling them constitutes your consent to receive and follow the policies. Therefore, if you do not agree to the terms of its terms, you are asked not to make any use of the application and the website. Very important instructions. Among other things, the use of the application and the website is subject to strict adherence to the rules of the regulations. The Application Operator and Site's Intellectual Property Rights must not be infringed or any Intellectual Property Rights or any other third party rights. These important instructions apply, without limitation, and without exception to all other instructions, to all users of the site, including suppliers and advertisers
